textContent:
Hey Arvind,
I am Princewill Okosun a recent computer science graduate who is en route to pursuing his MSc in computer science.

I recently came across your well written article on data structures in python which led me to your Linkedin which in turn led me to your "feel free to contact me at this mail".
I have the feeling that a connection between us both would be symbiotic as I am in my early stages and can provide a different fresh perspective to things.
I sent a connection request on Linkedin, I decided to mail you to build a connection stronger than just being connected via LinkedIn.
Please do have a splendid day!.
Sincerely,Princewill.
title: Connection Mail
textContentHtml:
Hey Arvind,

I am Princewill Okosun a recent computer science graduate who is en route to pursuing his MSc in computer science.


I recently came across your well written article on data structures in python which led me to your Linkedin which in turn led me to your "feel free to contact me at this mail".

I have the feeling that a connection between us both would be symbiotic as I am in my early stages and can provide a different fresh perspective to things.

I sent a connection request on Linkedin, I decided to mail you to build a connection stronger than just being connected via LinkedIn.

Please do have a splendid day!.

Sincerely,Princewill.
